text: Momin mard-o-aurat aapas mein aik doosray kay (madadgar-o-maavin aur) dost hain woh bhalaiyon ka hukum detay hain aur buraiyon say roktay hain namazon ko pabandi say baja latay hain zakat ada kertay hain Allah ki aur uss kay rasool ki baat maantay hain yehi log hain jin per Allah Taalaa both jald reham faramaye ga be-shak Allah ghalbay wala hikmat wala hai
